name: Gmail - Inbox (Unread/Chat ) FavMarker
description:
Gmail - Inbox (Unread/Chat) FavMarker (Version 0.1.3)

Author: Louis H - Tested on: Windows XP Firefox 3.5.4 - Last Update: 03.11.2009

Description:

    - Change the Favicon and title color when there are unread mail / chat (It based on the title text... sometimes may "WRONG" like "THIS TITLE NAME" :P )

    - Images,idea from UserScript "Show Unread Message Count on Favicon (Wooley)" by Peter Wooley, Tyler Sticka

Notice:
    - If you are using Gmail in other languages, please change all "Inbox (", " says…" in CSS to your Gamil tab's title e.g. "收件匣 (", " 說…"
